department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch:
本課程的目標在學習線性代數的基本數學概念與運算技巧。
9/15連結：
https://meet.google.com/ghs-tnja-ytg
goal.en:
The course aims to equip students with basic mathematical and computational skills of linear algebra.
9/15:
https://meet.google.com/ghs-tnja-ytg

outline.ch: 課程內容包括矩陣運算、線性方程式、向量空間、正交、矩陣行列式、線性轉換、特徵值分析與對角化等。
outline.en: Matrix computation, linear equations, vector spaces, orthogonality, determinants, linear transformations, eigenvalues and diagonalization.
